Description: You are bidding on a 1980 Ibanez Artist Electric Guitar, Model AR50BL. With its set-in neck and humbucking pickups, the AR50 is a descendant of the famous Ibanez Artist models of the late 1970s. The AR series features a smaller, redesigned body for lighter weight and comfort- later 80's AR50s were much thicker and had binding. This particular guitar is in Very Good ++ condition and hasn't really been played much in the last couple of years. There are only a few small edge picgs (as shown) that even hint of its age (38 !). We dont know if the pickups are the originals-they look and sound like Ibanez V2's but are marked "Gotoh" on the back (Gotoh is a Japanese manufacturer and a supplier to Ibanez). They sound awesome -very 80's ! Lots of vintage growl ! All our guitars are from a vast PRIVATE COLLECTION , not GC wallhangers ! Each and every one of our guitars have been hand selected and is vintage and unique.... SUSTAIN SUSTAIN SUSTAIN SUSTAIN SUSTAIN SUSTAIN SUSTAIN SUSTAIN SUSTAIN SUSTAINTHIS GUITAR IS A PIECE OF HISTORY- VINTAGE JAPANESE CRAFTSMANSHIP NO STRUCTURAL ISSUES . FRETS HAVE BEEN DRESSED , NO BUZZ . GET QUALITY ////PLAY ABILITY///SOUND////SUSTAIN////VERSATILITY WITHOUT A THREE THOUSAND DOLLAR PRICE TAG$$$$$$$$$$$$ This guitar is in super condition with only a couple of small pings (pictured)and some slight pickmarks. ! This guitar is easily a 9.0/10 (not bad for a nearly 4 decades old ! These 'buckers really deliver ! Super sound, very responsive all the tone and growl you would expect.....make the LP snobs turn their heads to see what rig your playing-OR USE THIS GUITAR AS A PLATFORM FOR A LP killer ! ! Its a great looking head turner and a rare (only made a couple of years) and fantastic sounding guitar ! This is a great example of the quality of the imports at the end of the 70's-the peak of Japanese Lutherie-this budget level Artist may not have the bling of its high end cousins like the AR5000, but its a fine instrument where it counts-nice neck, low action....beautiful craftmanship-all the same massive hardware as the top of the line Artists -a great opportunity to try one of these Gibson killers without breaking the bank...... These are getting harder and harder to find-and you NEVER see one in this condition.......(last one sold for $499 and was pretty beat up). Sorry, no case for this one-but we will provide a high quality gig bag at no additional cost. Someone is going to get a fantastic bargain on this one, as I am out of room and have to sell some guitars... I have tons of feedback, will answer all questions so bid with confidence.... Shipping is a flat rate of $45...SORRY, no international shipping. We accept Paypal and we can only ship to Paypal confirmed address..... Title: Ibanez Artist Guitar 1980 AR50 VG+
